description: Nightfighters tells the story of the Tuskegee Airmen, a group of elite black pilots who distinguished themselves during numerous World War II combat missions, despite the segregation and racism that existed in the U.S. military at...
name: Nightfighters: The True Story of the 332nd Fighter Group: The Tuskegee Airmen
